Info.Title: The Elevator: Three Minutes Can Change Your Life
Info.Writer: Mauro Graiani, Riccardo Irrera, Daniela Merlo (English adaptation)
Info.Actors: Caroline Goodall, Burt Young, James Parks, Katie McGovern
Info.Plot: A disturbing psychological thriller, that engages the audience to the point that it is always caught off guard, thus changing the point of view of the two main performers.
